description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.cQtmz297P5g6g5xv]{Advanced Mods}

Once per day as a standard action, your drone can turn invisible for 10 minutes, as per theinvisibility spell. If it makes an attack during this time, the invisibility ends. Your drone can spend 2 Resolve Points to use this ability again on the same day. Your drone must have the reactive camouflage mod to select this.
